subject: Methods with random numbers
msgSnippet: Hi I am trying to write junit test cases for a class. Some of the functions in the class use random numbers by calling the function Math.random(). Is there any
messageBody:
Hi

I am trying to write junit test cases for a class.
Some of the functions in the class use random numbers
by calling the function Math.random(). Is there any
way to verify the method.

Thank you

sudhir shakya
